title: Minab Toyur Hormozgan F.C.
text:
Minab Toyur Hormozgan Football Club is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Minab">Minab</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. They currently compete in the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Iran%20Football%27s%202nd%20Division">2012–13 Iran Football's 2nd Division</a>.
Season-by-Season.
